title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. I, pt. 7 - Hiring Regulations For Registrants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. I, pt. 7 - Hiring Regulations For Registrants

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 7.1 to 7.4)

Employee Listings (§ 7.5 to 7.11)

Hiring Procedures (§ 7.12 to 7.24)

Reactivated and New Piers (§ 7.25 to 7.28)

Priorities (§ 7.29 to 7.40)

Maintaining and Availability of Records: Monitoring (§ 7.41 to 7.42)

Prohibited Conduct (§ 7.43 to 7.46)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. I, pt. 7

Statutory authority: New York L. 1953, ch. 882, § 7, art. IV; New Jersey L. 1953, ch. 202; Unconsolidated Laws, §
9810

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
